Laurel – “Shells (Durante Remix)”

posted by Confusion on October 26, 2014 in Audio

Image via Facebook

London singer/producer Laurel released “Shells” back in June, and now Durante gives the track new life with a smooth remix. With handclaps and an upbeat bounce to it, the song has plenty of energy, but it somehow manages to maintain a cool, calm vibe. Listen below, and buy it here.

Read our interview with Laurel here.

Tags:  laurel
